directions: Combine strawberries, banana, almond milk, ice, cilantro, lime juice, and stevia powder in a blender. Process until smooth, adding more almond milk or water for a smoother consistency.
ingredients: 1 cup frozen strawberries, slightly thawed and chopped
¼ cup chopped cilantro, leaves and stems, lightly packed
title: Strawberry-Lime-Cilantro Smoothie
